 2022-07172022-06-20,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  AAFC
ActAgricultural Marketing Programs Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Agricultural Marketing Programs Regulations (2022)
PrecisRegulations Amending the AGRICULTURAL MARKETING PROGRAMS REGULATIONS in order to temporarily increase the interest-free loan limit under the Advance Payments Program (APP) to $250,000 for all eligible agricultural producers for the 2022 and 2023 program years.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2022-0152 Publication Date: 2022-07-06
AttachmentsAttachment
